overview:
AJ brings over 15 years of business development and strategic marketing experience to Drobo.

Previously, AJ served as Vice President of Business Development at Citrix Systems where he drove strategy and execution for the global partner ecosystem and emerging market programs. Prior to Citrix AJ spent five years as the Sr. Director of Strategic Development at Brocade Communications and held responsibility for corporate alliances, strategic partners, licensing and strategy. AJ has held various senior roles at companies such as Linare, Microvision and was an early employee at Avocent Corporation where he held responsibility for world-wide OEM marketing and business development.
